sourcesContent:
Текущее время: {{currentTime}} {{currentDateStr}}
{{Get_monthStr(selectDate.getMonth())}} {{selectDate.getFullYear()}}
{{LangData('mon')}} {{LangData('tue')}} {{LangData('wed')}} {{LangData('thu')}} {{LangData('fri')}} {{LangData('sat')}} {{LangData('sun')}}
  • {{day.dateString}}
  • dayOfMonth: {{day.dayOfMonth}}
  • isCurrentMonth: {{day.isCurrentMonth}}
  • isCurrentDay: {{day.isCurrentDay}}
  • isSelectedDay: {{day.isSelectedDay}}
  • month: {{day.month}}
  • year: {{day.year}}
